author: kpiroumian
msg: Corrections related to Windows/non-Windows distinction in instructions.

author: nicolaken
msg: Moved the centipede ang forrest logos above the bottom copyright bar, since it's
intended to be at the very bottom.
Added a "Last Published" date after the bottom copyright notice.
It uses Emacscript to show the lastmodified date of the page.
To be clear, this doesn't mean that it has to remain that way, we could decide not to use javascript at all. But this method gives you the *exact* lastmodified date.
If the browser doesn't have Emacscript, it just shows the copyright, thus degrading gracefully.
